name: Zombie Jam (matt D)
description:
Submission for the MFGJ Summer 2022:

https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2022

Theme of jam: Heal

Plot: You are the lone survivor of a zombie apocalypse.  You are equipped with the patented Zombie Jam.  Spread the jam on the zombies to cure them of the zombie infection.
